properties.entry: update sc_amazon_order set tn_status = '2' where account_id = '{@#accountId#}' AND exists ( select 1 from sc_amazon_order_status where sc_amazon_order_status.pick_status = '10' and sc_amazon_order_status.order_id = sc_amazon_order.order_id ) AND (tn_status is null or tn_status = '')

update sc_amazon_order set tn_status = '1' where account_id = '{@#accountId#}' AND exists ( select 1 from sc_amazon_order_status where sc_amazon_order_status.pick_status = '10' and sc_amazon_order_status.order_id = sc_amazon_order.order_id ) AND tn_status = '2'

select sc_amazon_order.* , (select track_number from sc_order_result where sc_order_result.order_id = sc_amazon_order.order_id ) as TN from sc_amazon_order where account_id = '{@#accountId#}' AND exists ( select 1 from sc_amazon_order_status where sc_amazon_order_status.pick_status = '10' and sc_amazon_order_status.order_id = sc_amazon_order.order_id ) AND tn_status='2'
